posts.postText:
http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll94/Domineeto/Reccetear.png 
I had 200,000 due at the end of the week, I only had enough to pay 160 because I spent all my money on lances that I can usually get a high profit off, I bought them at a high price, so I would make a larger profit if I bought them at the average price. When I restocked my store the news announced that the price of all polearms has decreased. I was loosing -5 to -7k on every spear I sold. Other than that epic fail the game is AWESOME! Thanks Dick Nixon :D
What do you do in that game?
Go in dungeons to get treasures and rare items, hire adventurers, kill bosses, stock your shop and run it, its really addicting!

>>  http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll94/Domineeto/Reccetear.png 
I had 200,000 due at the end of the week, I only had enough to pay 160 because I spent all my money on lances that I can usually get a high profit off, I bought them at a high price, so I would make a larger profit if I bought them at the average price. When I restocked my store the news announced that the price of all polearms has decreased. I was loosing -5 to -7k on every spear I sold. Other than that epic fail the game is AWESOME! Thanks Dick Nixon :D
